memberdef.name: modelOverrideWarning
memberdef.initializer: = "Model override is really only meant to be used in " + "the scene view for lining things up; using it at runtime is discouraged. Use tracked device " + "index instead to ensure the correct model is displayed for all users."

briefdescription.para: Helper function to handle the inconvenient fact that the packing for RenderModel_t is different on Linux/OSX (4) than it is on Windows (8)
Helper function to handle the inconvenient fact that the packing for RenderModel_TextureMap_t is different on Linux/OSX (4) than it is on Windows (8)
